title: Kohler K-2279-1-96 Drop-In Bathroom Sink With Single Faucet Hole in Biscuit
item_description:
Kohler K-2279-1-96 Drop-In Bathroom Sink With Single Faucet Hole in Biscuit

  • Seller States: New in Box - Retail over $300
  • 16.875" Width
  • 19.75" Length
  • Single faucet hole.
  • Oval basin.
  • Overflow drain.
  • Coordinates with other products in the Devonshire collection.
  • Material: Vitreous china.
  • Installation: Drop-in
